title: Ride impressions: Do the Bontrager Aeolus RSL aero carbon road wheels live up to the hype?
content:
Bontrager’s new Aelous wheelset is hyper-focused aerodynamics and speed- dubbed by the company as “the fastest wheel we’ve ever created”. We had a chance to put them through the paces and races – do they live up to the claims? The line is an expansion of the previously released Aeolus 37 RSL (not to be […]

The post Ride impressions: Do the Bontrager Aeolus RSL aero carbon road wheels live up to the hype? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Staff
